name: #5ca1ed
description:
Play as a squishy square progressing through 20 fast paced and challenging levels using  your bodies natural abilities of sliding, dashing and wall jumping to avoid the various dangers and reach the goal.

Controls:

  • WASD / AD + SPACE / ARROW KEYS to move
  • '<' and '>' to dash

Sound Effects:
     https://www.zapsplat.com

Background Music: 
     https://soundcloud.com/selrate
     https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKI5JqRVTxZA2tRN6gFZrUg
